meanings.definition: An untidy collection of things piled up haphazardly.
meanings.sent1: The children made a heap of toys in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: She found a heap of clothes on her bed when she returned home.
meanings.sent3: The heap of papers on his desk looked like a mini mountain.
meanings.sent4: The old books formed a heap as high as a small hill.
meanings.sent5: The heap of leaves in the yard rustled in the wind.

meanings.definition: A large amount or quantity of something.
meanings.sent1: There was a heap of sand at the construction site.
meanings.sent2: She received a heap of praise for her performance on stage.
meanings.sent3: The heap of candies in the jar tempted the children.
meanings.sent4: The heap of presents under the tree delighted the family.
meanings.sent5: The heap of dishes in the sink awaited washing.
